sentences.en: He is fond of rambling among the trees.
He stood in my kitchen drinking beer, rambling on about Lillian.
sentences.cn: 他站在我的厨房里喝着啤酒，漫无边际地讲着有关莉莲的事情。

sentences.en: He tightened his blurred, rambling voice and said again.
sentences.cn: 他扯尖了他那含混不清的嗓音,又颠三倒四地说了起来.

sentences.en: Here was an old church, quaint and rambling and gabled.
sentences.cn: 这儿有一座古老的教堂, 样子古雅,显得零乱,是带山墙的建筑.

sentences.en: Here was an old church, quait and rambling and gabled.
sentences.cn: 这儿有一座不很整齐的,砌着三角墙的, 古色古香的老教堂.

sentences.en: His actions were accompanied by a rambling monologue.
sentences.cn: 他的行动伴随着一串冗长含糊的独白。

sentences.en: It was easy to get lost in the rambling house.
sentences.cn: 在布局凌乱的大房子里容易迷路.

sentences.en: Prune rambling roses when the flowers have faded.
sentences.cn: 花朵凋谢后要剪除杂生的玫瑰枝。

sentences.en: She had a huge, rambling country house called'The Gables '.
sentences.cn: 她在乡下有一幢巨大杂乱的房子,叫作 “ 山墙庄园”.

sentences.en: Then he started rambling and repeating himself.
sentences.cn: 他接下来就开始不着边际、说话来回重复了。

sentences.en: They spent the morning rambling woodland paths.
sentences.cn: 他们整个上午都在林中小径上漫步.

sentences.en: To all these rambling observations , Mr. Swiveller answered not one word.
sentences.cn: 对于这篇杂乱无章的谈话, 斯威夫勒先生不置一词.

sentences.en: Vague and rambling observations were made in reply.
sentences.cn: 回答的是一些含糊杂乱的意见.

sentences.en: Victorian houses can seem cold with their lofty ceilings and rambling rooms.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚式房屋屋顶高耸，房间布局凌乱，因此可能会显得较为阴冷。

sentences.en: What is she rambling on about?
sentences.cn: 她在东拉西扯些什么 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 漫步者，漫谈者；攀缘蔷薇
漫步；漫游；闲逛；漫谈；蔓延

trans.tran_cn: 闲逛的，漫步的，闲聊的，（思想）散漫的，布局凌乱的，杂乱无章的
乡间漫步,漫无目的的讲话；长而离题的文章
（无目的地）漫游( ramble的现在分词)，（喻）漫谈，扯淡，长篇大论
